sentences.sContent: those who have the know-how to exploit the technology to the fullest
sentences.sCn: 那些知道如何将技术发挥到最大限度的人

sentences.sContent: No other company had the technical know-how to deal with the disaster.
sentences.sCn: 其他公司都不具备应对这一灾难所必需的技术知识。

synos.tran: 诀窍；实际知识；专门技能

trans.tranCn: 实际知识； 技能； 窍门
trans.tranOther: knowledge, practical ability, or skill to do something
